description: Voidborn source-level string patches for ULT3 engine (no length constraints)
note: Used with source_patcher.py + asmiigs reassembly. Replaces ASC directives in ult3.s. Falls back to engine_strings.json (binary, length-constrained) when asmiigs is unavailable.

patches.text:
SEEK YE, THE
SIGIL OF KINGS!

YOU SEE A VISION
OF THE TIME LORD
  HE TELLS YOU
 THE ONE WAY IS
 GLOOM, FLUX,
 WARP & VOID,
 ALL ELSE FAILS.
